title: New & Video: Kirk Spencer – Kukcu (feat. Safia May)
body:
With the beginning of a new week creeping ever closer, and the familiar tedium of Monday only a few hours away, what’s more appropriate than a piece of music that questions the very fabric of ones mind? Nothing’s more appropriate.

The debut single from **[Kirk Spencer](https://www.facebook.com/kirkspenceriscool)** may be a bit too much for the more fragile amongst you this Sunday, if that’s the case then maybe listen to it tomorrow, because _Kukcu_ is rather spectacular piece of music. Its masterful melding of tones is the track’s greatest strength, if not simply ambitious in the extreme. **Spencer** juxtaposes the soft and mature voice of **Safia May**, with thick synths, pulsating beats and reverberating south-Asian samples to create something that’s actually rather violent and intimidating; in the best possible way.

Spencer’s EP _Wonderland_ is set to be released March 25.
